title: New House Sales
description: The `New House Sales` dataset, with its comprehensive monthly data on new single-family house sales in the U.S. divided by region from January 1973 to August 2023, offers a pivotal resource for analyzing regional housing market dynamics, forecasting trends, and informing economic policy decisions. Generated by the U.S. Census Bureau's Survey of Construction, it serves as an essential tool for economists, urban planners, and market analysts interested in the evolution of the U.S. housing sector.

idField.name: Region
idField.description: Unique identifier for each region; one of Mid-west, North-east, South and West.

timeField.name: Period
timeField.description: Date representing month and year of the observation.

forecastTarget.name: houses_sold_not_seas_adj
forecastTarget.description: Target variable; Number of houses sold in thousands; not seasonality adjusted

pastCovariates.name: houses_sold_annualized_seas_adj
pastCovariates.description: Annualized houses sold in thousands; seasonality adjusted
